original_text: What I have said is true. Nobody can say that I am telling lies. You cannot think that my words are useless.’ What I have said is true. Nobody can say that I am telling lies. You cannot think that my words are useless.’ What I have said is true. Nobody can say that I am telling lies. You cannot think that my words are useless.’ What I have said is true.
korean_text: 가령 그렇지 않을지라도 능히 내 말을 거짓되다고 지적하거나 내 말을 헛되게 만들 자 누구랴

sentences.original_text: What I have said is true
Nobody can say that I am telling lies
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 내가 거짓말한다고 말할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: You cannot think that my words are useless
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내 말이 쓸모없다고 생각할 수 없다
